data.name: Boost HP
data.description: Add {value} HP at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Fire
data.description: Add {value}% fire damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Water
data.description: Add {value}% water damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Air
data.description: Add {value}% air damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Boost Damage Earth
data.description: Add {value}% earth damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Restore
data.description: Restores {value} HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of their health points.

data.name: healing
data.description: Every 3 played turns, restores {value}% of HP at the start of the turn.

data.name: Antipoison
data.description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes {value} poison damage.

data.name: Poison
data.description: At the start of its first turn, applies a {value} poison to its opponent. Loses {value} HP per turn.

data.name: Lifesteal
data.description: Restores {value}% of the total attack of all elements in HP after a critical strike.

data.name: Reconstitution
data.description: Every {value} played turns, regains all HP.

data.name: Burn
data.description: On his first turn, apply a burn effect of {value}% of your attack of all elements. The damage is applied each turn and decreases by 10% each time.

data.name: Boost Resistance Air
data.description: Gives {value}% air resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Water
data.description: Gives {value}% water resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Earth
data.description: Gives {value}% earth resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Boost Resistance Fire
data.description: Gives {value}% fire resistance at the start of fight.

data.name: Corrupted
data.description: After every time the bearer of this effect is attacked, their resistance to the attack's element is reduced by {value}%, and can go negative.

data.name: Guard
data.description: If one or more allies have less than 50% of their HP, protects the ally with the lowest HP percentage, redirecting {value} % of their damage to this character until the start of my next turn. Activates a maximum of 3 times per combat.

data.name: Shell
data.description: When they drop below 40% of their HP, they gain {value} % resistance to all elements for 3 turns. Activates once per combat. This effect is only active during boss fights.

data.name: Frenzy
data.description: Each time they land a critical hit, they giveÂ {value}% damage to themselves and their allies until the end of their next turn.

data.name: Void Drain
data.description: Every 4 turns, Drains {value}% HP from each enemy to heal themselves.

data.name: Berserker Rage
data.description: When they drop below 25% HP, they gain {value} % damage permanently. Applies once per combat.

data.name: Vampiric Strike
data.description: After landing a critical hit, they heal the ally with the lowest HP for {value}% of the damage dealt. Can only trigger once every 3 turns. This effect does not heal the caster.

data.name: Healing Aura
data.description: Every 2 played turns, they heal all allies for {value}% of their maximum HP. This effect does not heal the caster.

data.name: Barrier
data.description: At the start of the fight and every 5 played turns, gain a protective barrier of {value} HP. All attacks are redirected to this barrier until it is destroyed.

data.name: Splash Restore
data.description: Restores {value} HP at the start of the turn to another character who has lost the most health if that character has less than 50% of their health points remaining.

data.name: Heal
data.description: Heal {value} HP when the item is used.

data.name: Gold
data.description: Adds {value} gold in your inventory.

data.name: Teleport
data.description: Teleports to map ID {value} when the item is used.

data.name: Fire Attack
data.description: Adds {value} Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Attack
data.description: Adds {value} Water Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Attack
data.description: Adds {value} Air Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Attack
data.description: Adds {value} Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Damage
data.description: Adds {value}% Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Fire Damage
data.description: Adds {value}% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Damage
data.description: Adds {value}% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Damage
data.description: Adds {value}% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Damage
data.description: Adds {value}% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Fire Resistance
data.description: Adds {value}% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Resistance
data.description: Adds {value}% Water Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Resistance
data.description: Adds {value}% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Resistance
data.description: Adds {value}% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Critical Strike
data.description: Adds {value}% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Wisdom
data.description: Adds {value} Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Prospecting
data.description: Adds {value} Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Woodcutting
data.description: Reduces cooldown by {value}% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Fishing
data.description: Reduces cooldown by {value}% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Mining
data.description: Reduces cooldown by {value}% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Alchemy
data.description: Reduces cooldown by {value}% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Hit points
data.description: Adds {value} HP to its stats when equipped.
